data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is the Statistical T-Test module to compare 2 inde pendent
    samples. It takes 2 array of point measures, compute the confidence
    intervals using the PointEstimation module (which is also included
    in this package) and use the T-statistic to test the null
    hypothesis. If the null hypothesis is rejected,the difference will
    be given as the lower_clm and upper_clm of the TTest object. the
    TTest name is just a straight forward name of this module
